attributes.action: Ban today the payment of bonuses to the staff of banks who have received tax payers money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are told that these bonuses are contractual.As I understand it they are discretionary upon performance.A long winded review on the running of banks will not solve the problem.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
